thread.title: Ground News - Thanks to 757 votes: Rafi Sa'ar won an additional term as mayor of Kfar Saba
thread.title_full: Ground News - Thanks to 757 votes: Rafi Sa'ar won an additional term as mayor of Kfar Saba

author: israelhayom.co.il
title: Ground News - Thanks to 757 votes: Rafi Sa'ar won an additional term as mayor of Kfar Saba
text: Ser and the municipal council, Hevra, Deri, led a very tight race and at the end of the vote count Ser received 46.8% compared to Deri with 45.3% • Due to the close result, we waited in Beersheba to count the doubled votes that confirmed his right as mayor • A total of 47,491 residents voted • The runner-up Deri won 20,738 votes and the runner-up Asnat Sported with 3,608 votes. Summary by israelhayom.co.il 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] israelhayom.co.il Thanks to 757 votes: Rafi Sa'ar won an additional term as mayor of Kfar Saba Ser and the municipal council, Hevra, Deri, led a very tight race and at the end of the vote count Ser received 46.8% compared to Deri with 45.3% • Due to the close result, we waited in Beersheba to count the doubled votes that confirmed his right as mayor • A total of 47,491 residents voted • The runner-up Deri won 20,738 votes and the runner-up Asnat Sported with 3,608 votes. 38 minutes agoRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
